name: Peace Domain
description: Peace domain clerics foster harmony and strengthen bonds between allies.

1.name: Implement of Peace
1.description: Gain proficiency in Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.

1.name: Emboldening Bond
1.description: As an action, bond creatures within 30 feet for 10 minutes. While bonded and within 30 feet of each other, they can add a d4 to an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw once per turn. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Balm of Peace
2.description: Move without provoking opportunity attacks and heal creatures you pass within 5 feet for 2d6 + Wisdom modifier.

6.name: Protective Bond
6.description: When a bonded creature takes damage, another bonded creature can use its reaction to teleport near it and take the damage instead.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with cleric cantrips.

17.name: Expansive Bond
17.description: Your bond and protective bond work within 60 feet, and the creature that takes another's damage has resistance to that damage.

choices.name: Peace Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Peace Domain subclass
